name: walk with me.
description:
WALK WITH ME  — CONVERSATIONS BETWEEN A YOUNG GOD AND A HEART OF STONE.

amid the war of gods, a young god finds a friend in the mountains. snippets of conversation of a story that has already told / has yet to be finished. a brief game jam experiment on writing across both twine and trying out bitsy. 

story autosaves at specific checkpoints. played best on a computer browser, has not been optimised for mobile. estimated playing time ~25 minutes.

known issues:

  • sometimes, after exiting a bitsy passage, you may need to click on the game area again to restore keyboard controls. if you tend to click to advance, then it should work fine.
  • depending on your screen size, certain descriptions when accompanied by an image may run beyond the set height. the browser should scroll down automatically to the lowest section of text, but if not, try clicking and scrolling manually.
